script-type.name: player
script-type.blurb: A player that is or was present in the current match.

method.name: apply_traits
method.blurb: Apply a set of player traits to a player for the current tick.
method.example: alias is_zombie = player.number[0] alias zombie_traits = script_traits[0] for each player do if current_player.is_zombie == 0 then current_player.apply_traits(zombie_traits) end end
